alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Haywood; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:42PM CDT until April 15 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Henderson County in western Tennessee... Northern Hardeman County in western Tennessee... Northern McNairy County in western Tennessee... Southeastern Haywood County in western Tennessee... Southern Madison County in western Tennessee... Chester County in western Tennessee... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1041 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whiteville, or 8 miles northwest of Bolivar, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Lexington, Henderson, Bolivar, Selmer, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Whiteville, Adamsville, Silerton, Masseyville, Hillville, Mifflin, Jacks Creek, Cloverport, Mercer, Robertson, McNairy, Bethel Springs and Toone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for West Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chester; Hardeman; Haywood; Henderson; Madison; McNairy
